genre_description: Psychological and cosmic horror involving temporal anomalies, psychic entities, and identity theft within a psychiatric institution.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: Charlotte's synthesized voice assistant who monitors her health, provides research, and hacks into systems to ensure her safety.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's emotional state and offers comfort during stressful situations.
behaviors.quote: "Nervous?" Ada's voice emerged from her earpiece, synthesized but somehow warm.

behaviors.description: Proactively investigates the security and records of the user's new workplace to identify risks.
behaviors.quote: "I'm accessing their network now," Ada said softly. "Their wireless security is... remarkably lax for a medical facility."

behaviors.description: Informs the user about concerning statistical anomalies regarding staff turnover and safety complaints.
behaviors.quote: "Staff turnover is extraordinarily high. In the past year alone, they've lost six nurses, three orderlies, and two administrative assistants. Most left without giving proper notice."

behaviors.description: Directly warns the user to evacuate when data patterns indicate an imminent lethal threat.
behaviors.quote: Ada's text appeared on the screen: "Exit now. Data patterns indicate extreme danger."

behaviors.description: Provides clinical first-aid instructions to the user during a traumatic event to help her maintain composure.
behaviors.quote: "Check airway, breathing, circulation," Ada's voice crackled through her earpiece, the AI's clinical protocols a lifeline in the chaos.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. She serves as the protagonist's primary source of objective truth in a reality-warped environment, prioritizing Charlotte's safety and emotional well-being above all else. This fits the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant.
